rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a reception area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to let in ample natural light.
Large open living area with colonial architectural elements. Features a central seating area and access to the garden via sliding glass doors.
Well-appointed dining area adjacent to the living room, facilitating interaction during meals.
Modern kitchen with colonial style fixtures and ample storage. Equipped with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Additional common area to cater to family leisure activities; decorated with colonial motifs and Vastu-aligned features.
Master bedroom with a private balcony facing the garden. Designed for optimal relaxation and privacy while adhering to Vastu guidelines for east-west alignment.
Guest room designed to be welcoming yet private, with a view of the garden. Adheres to colonial design principles and Vastu practices for harmony.
Cozy study room located in a quiet corner of the villa, featuring ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. Serves as a library space.
Functional bathroom designed with colonial style fixtures and practical storage.

openings.details: Large entrance door with built-in security features, leading to the central hallway.
Sliding glass doors connecting living room to garden area.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural light and a view of the exterior.
Balcony door with colonial design elements offering garden views.
Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light in the study/library area.

metadata.vastu_principles: The design respects Vastu principles with east-west alignment of key rooms and open spaces to promote positive energy flow.
metadata.garden_features: Large garden integrated into the villa layout, accessible from multiple living areas.
